    • testMergeAndRestartingMaster

      public void testMergeAndRestartingMaster() throws Exception
      Not really restarting the master. Simulate it by clear of new region state since it is not persisted, will be lost after master restarts.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testMerge

      public void testMerge() throws Exception
      This test tests 1, merging region not online; 2, merging same two regions; 3, merging unknown regions. They are in one test case so that we don't have to create many tables, and these tests are simple.
      Throws:
      Exception
